Package org.coronabounce.models

Class Position

java.lang.Object
org.coronabounce.models.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Class used to save an x & an y.
Position are always between x & y limits of the controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • Position

      public Position​(Controllable controller, boolean chooseAUniquePosition)
      Main constructor.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller used to fix limits.
      chooseAUniquePosition - If true it will try to fined a unique position in the Zone.

    • setPos

      public void setPos​(double x, double y)
      Set a new x & y.
      It will set position only in the limits of the Zone.
      Dot radius is used to avoid GUI glitch.

      Returns:

    • cleanListTakenPositions

      public static void cleanListTakenPositions()
      Clean the list of the taken positions. It allowed to create new Position without checking if old Position interfer with this 1.
